alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harlan and southern Bell Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ponza, or near Pineville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hutch and Balkan around 520 PM EDT. Oaks and Black Snake around 525 PM EDT. Cubage around 530 PM EDT. THIS INCLUDES U.S. Highway 25 East in Bell County between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
